Instruction: Knead dough on a floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes. Place in a lightly oiled bowl, turning to coat. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 1 hour.

Prepare the preheated oven and pizza stone. Roll out the dough on a lightly floured surface. Add toppings, then bake for a delicious homemade pizza!

Form a pizza stone by dusting flour onto a baking sheet. Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C). Bake the pizza on the stone in the preheated oven until the bottom of the crust is browned, 6 to 8 minutes.
